FREEPBX_HOSTNAME_DESC: The host name to apply to the FreePBX server. Defaults to hostname.example.com
FREEPBX_HOSTNAME_MSG: The host name must start and end with a letter or number and can only contain: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, dot (.), or dash (-)
FREEPBX_HTTP_PORT_DESC: The HTTP port for the web server. Defaults to 8070.
FREEPBX_HTTPS_PORT_DESC: The secure HTTP port for the web server. Defaults to 8071.
FREEPVX_SIP_PORT_DESC: The SIP transport port for the PBX server. Defaults to 5060.
